glsa.title: UDisks: Multiple Vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in UDisks, the worst of which can lead to execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: UDisks provides a daemon, tools and libraries to access and manipulate disks, storage devices and technologies.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in UDisks. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All UDisks users should upgrade to the latest version:
